physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence regarding the manuscript of Sir Hassan Suhrawardy, titled The Truth about Muhammed. The correspondence, which is between the India Office, the External Affairs Department (Government of India), and Clarendon Press, is concerned with the safe return of Suhrawardy's manuscript after a previously mailed copy was intercepted by enemy action.
